biography: Jarkko, affectionately known as "Bailando" among his peers, is a formidable competitor from Hirsala Golf. Jarkko is known for his flamboyant style.

A seasoned participant in the Hector Trophée, 2025 will mark Jarkko's ninth appearance at the event. With one Hector Trophée victory and one Victor Trophy to his name, Jarkko has proven himself to be a force to be reckoned with.

Off the course, Jarkko is a man of meticulous habits, known for his rigorous preparation and unwavering focus. His dedication to the sport is evident in his consistent performance and his commitment to excellence.
